articles.title: Video: Former White House Press Secretary believes Trump was aware of Bannon's plan - CNN Video
articles.description: Former Trump White House Press Secretary Stephanie Grisham reacts to audio of Steve Bannon discussing Trump's plan to declare victory in the 2020 election regardless of the outcome, three days before election day.

articles.title: How is Donald Trump reacting to January 6 hearings? - CNN Video
articles.description: According to sources, former President Donald Trump is "always watching" the January 6 committee hearings. CNN's Kristen Holmes reports how he is reacting to the hearings and the current state of his relationship with long time adviser, Roger Stone, since the…

articles.description: Former President Donald Trump tried to call a member of the White House support staff who was talking to the House select committee investigating January 6, 2021, two sources familiar with the matter tell CNN.

articles.title: Former CIA employee convicted for carrying out largest data leak in agency's history
articles.description: A former CIA employee charged with carrying out the largest leak of classified data in the agency's history was convicted on all counts in federal court Wednesday.
articles.content:

articles.author: Chuck Johnston
articles.title: A man was charged in the rape of a 10-year-old who traveled to Indiana for an abortion
articles.description: A Columbus man has been charged with raping a 10-year-old Ohio girl who then had to travel to Indiana seeking an abortion after the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade, according to court proceedings CNN obtained through affiliate WBNS.

articles.title: Analysis: How the January 6 committee has already succeeded
articles.description: Almost a year ago to the day, I wrote a piece with this headline: "Nancy Pelosi just doomed the already tiny chances of the 1/6 committee actually mattering."

articles.author: Sara Murray, Jason Morris and Ted Barrett, CNN
articles.title: Lindsey Graham moving to quash subpoena from Georgia grand jury investigating Trump
articles.description: South Carolina Sen. Lindsey Graham is aiming to quash a subpoena for his testimony before an Atlanta-area special grand jury investigating former President Donald Trump's efforts to overturn the 2020 election results in Georgia.

articles.author: Nathaniel Meyersohn, CNN Business
articles.title: What the heck happened to the Gap?
articles.description: In 1969, real estate investor Don Fisher opened a store in San Francisco aimed at teens and college kids, offering Levi's blue jeans alongside records and tapes.
